name: Media Profile
tagline: Passionate... About Our Work and Yours
description:
Media Profile is an independent, entrepreneurial and tenacious communications firm. Canada’s most recognized brands and organizations choose to work with us because we’re laser focused on achieving their objectives.
We believe that communications campaigns should be based on a healthy blend of research and imagination. We use all the tools in our toolbox, including our expertise in media relations, social media, content creation, marketing, employee communications, launches, speeches and more.
READ MORE...
